definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fpl. [[עָרַיִךְ תִּצֶּינׇה מֵאֵין יוֹשֵׁב]] Je 4:7 thy cities shall fall in ruins (read prob. [[תִּנׇּחֶינׇה]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[גַּלִּים נִצִּים]] ruined heaps, i.e. ruin-heaps, 2Ki 19:25 = Is 37:26.—On Je 2:15, Je 9:9, Je 9:11, Je 46:19 v. [[יחת]].
